title: Requirements for astar-pathfinding (updated for item_nodes and next_node_type)
response:
Feedback Summary (1 comments):

General Comments:
1. The spec should leverage every nodes table available, including taking into consideration the next_node, since when that field is populated, it becomes a mandatory execution

comments.comment: The spec should leverage every nodes table available, including taking into consideration the next_node, since when that field is populated, it becomes a mandatory execution
